about_the_game:
Explore the secrets at the end of the abyss

During a mining accident in the Unnamed Basin, people discovered an unknown huge deep pit. Monsters would crawl out of this pit from time to time. Many mechas were guarding this pit, and many mechas were also going deep into it for exploration, but for deep As the pit became increasingly known, some legends began to spread, and the pit also had its own name...
Abyss of Cain
Some people say that there are heritages from ancient times in the pit,someone say that the pit contains rich mineral deposits,someone say that the truth of the world is buried there. No matter what is there, curiosity about the unknown drives people with various purposes to go deep into it, even if most of it never returns...

Content

This is a level-breaking game that includes deck building elements and Rougelike elements.
Players need to control a mecha in the game to continuously go deep into the underground, and use their own weapons or collected equipment to defeat enemies in each layer of the underground.
In level. Players need to defeat all enemies while protecting the mecha to complete the level..

Features

Equipment deck building:Player equipment can be recycled. After passing each level, you will collect different equipment to better defeat enemies.
Fast paced levels:At the beginning of each battle, the results of building equipment will be quickly verified, testing the player's adaptability.
Random map:Players can encounter different enemies and events every time they play, and receive random equipment bonuses and narrative fragments.
Featured enemies:Each enemy will have its own specific behavior and different characteristics, testing the player's understanding of the battle situation.
